name: Seeker of Adventures
detailed_description:
Seeker of Adventures - is the simplest 2D platformer with surviving elements where you need to do hardcore levels playing as a traveller who wants to be rich finding treasure of ancient tribes. The main idea of the game is simple: there are four gold tiny statues. You have to collect all of them. Then the door to the traveller’s house will open and you will get to the next level.

But, as we know, travelling like that you should remember – it isn’t so clear in our life… On your way to success there will be lots of traps and obstacles. You are the one who’s going to make decisions and act. So, it will depend only on you what will happen to your hero: find treasure or die. There is no the third thing. Good luck!
